title: Up Close & "Cliterate"
itunes:title: Up Close & "Cliterate"
itunes:subtitle: Up Close and "Cliterate"
description:
On this show, Emily and Menace are reunited, to tackle a wide array of your sex and relationship quandaries.

How do you know when it’s time to commit? What’s the best way to get your partner to step up their foreplay game? What do you do if you’re just not a natural born cuddler? These are just a few of the questions Emily and Menace address on their quest to help you have better sex. Also discussed, the importance of “date nights” and increasing your level of “cliteracy.”

So whether you’re hitting a stumbling block in your relationship or you’re just itching to try something sexy and new, this show has the advice you need to get you where you want to be. Don’t miss it!


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
